name: Sole Mate
description:
Play as a lone sock trying to find it's sole mate.

Featherbrick Studios' entry to the Global Game Jam 2021.

Start - Pause
Select - Show Info
Left Analog Stick - Move non-grabbed sock end
Right Analog Stick - Move camera
A - Rise non-grabbed end
LB - Grab with sock tip
RB - Grab with sock hole
